'''Lethuin''' was a [[Silvan Elves|Silvan]] [[Elves|Elf]] of the [[Woodland Realm]] in the [[The Hobbit (film series)|''Hobbit'' films]], portrayed by Eli Kent.

==History==
Lethuin helped capture [[Thorin and Company]] while they were in [[Mirkwood]], and was later seen in the cellar conversing with [[Galion]] while [[Bilbo Baggins]] was searching for a means of helping the Dwarves escape.

==Etymology==
''Lethuin'' is an anagram of the name [[Lúthien]], which is similar to how other background characters were given names of that nature throughout the [[Peter Jackson]] films.{{fact}} However, there is no actual background or etymology behind it.
